messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2256......great spirit
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/17/2002 7:54:00 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Ren, thanks so much. I was wondering how it was coming across. Thanks for understanding my
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/17/2002 7:54:00 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


>
> I love your posts Kim. Such honesty and openess.....

Ren, thanks so much. I was wondering how it was coming across. Thanks for
understanding my plight.

> I am also drawn to my native roots, though my family isn't sure of the
> tribe.
> Ojibwa most likely (I had thought it was Cherokee all this time).

Sometime it comes to you in your dreams....
Are all of a sudden that thought or feeling is there.
I have a > book I think you should get, it's called "Wisdom Keepers" and has
> words of wisdom from leaders of various tribes.

Thanks..... I jotted it down on my book list....
>
> Keep the faith girl, follow your heart, it's leading you home.

The problem is that I am not sure if I should trust my heart.......I resist a
lot. Even though I am tired and want that freeness....I still fight and
resist which I do not understand......
I keep telling myself that you have to let go and get over this, but just
can't do it.......
Maybe in time.....

> Thanks for the encouragement though Ren. It is very appreciative.......
>

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
